fields.title: Vegan Lentil Soup
fields.description: A delisous hearty soup, perfect for an autum day
fields.Method:
1. Saute onions, carrots and garlic until soft.
  2. Add lentils, spices to taste and vegtiable stock.
  3. Simmer for 20-25mins intil lentils are soft.
  4. Blend and serve with your favorite vegan bread.
